Oct 28, 2014 7:36 pm KST
European Pressphoto Agency

Here’s a new theory about why Kim Jong Un was out of camera shot for 40 days: he was recovering from surgery to remove a tumor on his ankle.

That’s according to South Korea’s spy agency, which told lawmakers on Tuesday that a cyst appeared on the North Korean leader’s ankle in May and foreign doctors removed it during the September-October period.
